nodes.text: A kalak was a type of creature in the galaxy. Rashnold was sometimes found on kalaks.

When asked by Han Solo as to whether or not a squadron of TIE fighters was still pursuing the Millennium Falcon, Tobias Beckett described the situation as being like rashnold on a kalak, to Solo's confusion.
Kalaks were first mentioned in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story. Although the film's subtitles spell the name as "kalak," the novelization and the junior novelization spell the name as "kylak."
In the Star Wars Legends continuity, kalaks were first mentioned in the 2004 Star Wars Roleplaying Game sourcebook Geonosis and the Outer Rim Worlds.
